data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Culoptila (Trichoptera: Glossosomatidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Blahnik, Roger J., Holzenthal, Ralph W. (2006): Revision of the genus Culoptila (Trichoptera: Glossosomatidae). Zootaxa 1233: 1-52, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.172764
